movie.title: Shout
movie.description_intro: A new music teacher in a 1955 West Texas home for wayward boys brings new vision and hope for many of the interned boys.
movie.description_full: A new music teacher in a 1955 West Texas home for wayward boys brings new vision and hope for many of the interned boys.

movies.title: The Cat's Meow
movies.summary: In November of 1924, a mysterious Hollywood death occurred aboard media mogul William Randolph Hearst's yacht. Among the famous guests that weekend were: film star Charlie Chaplin; starlet Marion Davies (who was also Hearst's mistress at the time); silent-film producer Thomas H. Ince (known for creating the first Hollywood-studio facility and for creating an "assembly line" system for filmmaking); and feared gossip columnist, Louella Parsons.

Ince (known for creating the first Hollywood-studio facility and for creating an "assembly line" system for filmmaking); and feared gossip columnist, Louella Parsons.

movies.title: Dismissed
movies.summary: An idealistic, straight-edge teacher is drawn down a horrid rabbit hole by an honors student when he gives him a B+ on a paper.
movies.description_full: An idealistic, straight-edge teacher is drawn down a horrid rabbit hole by an honors student when he gives him a B+ on a paper.
movies.synopsis: An idealistic, straight-edge teacher is drawn down a horrid rabbit hole by an honors student when he gives him a B+ on a paper.

movies.title: Starstruck
movies.summary: Young woman wants to become the next big singer with the help of her friends and despite the wishes of her working class family.
movies.description_full: Young woman wants to become the next big singer with the help of her friends and despite the wishes of her working class family.
movies.synopsis: Young woman wants to become the next big singer with the help of her friends and despite the wishes of her working class family.

movies.title: Christmas with a View
movies.summary: This Christmas, Thunder Mountain Ski Resort is abuzz when celebrity chef Shane Roarke is named the new head chef. Clara Garrison isn't as excited and is instead focused on getting resettled after her failed attempt at opening a big city restaurant. With their paths constantly crossing, will their shared passion for cooking bring them together or will secrets keep them apart?
